entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries inland. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
